thread.title: Nando's diners' fury as restaurants 'run out of chicken' on Bank Holiday
thread.title_full: Nando's diners' fury as restaurants 'run out of chicken' on Bank Holiday

author: Saphora Smith
title: Nando's diners' fury as restaurants 'run out of chicken' on Bank Holiday
text:
Wednesday 4 January 2017 11:06 BST Nando's: The chain famous for its chicken reportedly ran out of the meat 
Nando’s restaurants up and down the country ran out of chicken over the New Year’s bank holiday, angry diners claim. 
Branches including Dalston , Bedford, Aylesbury and Leamington-Spa were hit by a shortage of their signature meat, restaurant-goers claimed on social media. 
Lillie Bleasdale wrote on Twitter : “This is an SOS. Leamington Nando’s has run out of chicken.” 
Another user tweeting under the handle @Cduffinhall wrote: “How are Nando’s in Aylesbury closed because they have no chicken HAHAHA” 
A user tweeting as Maddie wrote: "How has my local Nando's run out of chicken?...." @NandosUK @HeartShopping how can u run out of chicken!!! pic.twitter.com/LM8CiZn06n — Sunny C (@s_c007) January 2, 2017 
And @leonieb53 tweeted: “@NandosUK #dalston how can nandos run out of their signature meat? What do u mean you’ve RUN OUT of chicken fillets whilst I’m sitting here” How has my local Nando's run out of chicken?...😶 — M a d d i e (@madsphillipino) January 2, 2017 @NandosUK it was Aylesbury. It was a complete joke. They blamed the bank holiday weekend for lack of deliveries. 
Sunny C posted a picture of a takeaway menu with all dishes marked “sold out” adding the caption: “@NandosUk @HeartShopping how can u run out of chicken!” This is an SOS. Leamington Nando's has run out of chicken. 🐔 — Lillie Bleasdale (@Lillie_Bleas) January 1, 2017 @NandosUK goodbye dinner with the boys and Aylesbury have RAN OUT OF CHICKEN #Nandos #Fail #2017 #FirstWorldProblems — Jon Hammond (@Hammo_J) January 2, 2017 
Jon Hammond wrote on Twitter: “@NandosUK goodbye dinner with the boys and Aylesbury have RUN OUT OF CHICKEN #Nandos #Fail #2017 #FirstWorldProblems” @NandosUK #dalston how can nandos run out of their signature meat? What do u mean you've RUN OUT of chicken fillets whilst I'm sitting here😣 — It's Just Me (@leonieb53) December 30, 2016 
A spokesman for the restaurant chain said it was that the branch in Aylesbury had run out of the meat but could not comment on the other complaints. @NandosUK Bedford Nandos has run out of chicken? What is going on! — Juten Ahmed (@xTheAsthmaticYT) December 23, 2016 Drive all the way to @NandosUK Aylesbury to arrive to no Mango & Lime and no fillets for a burger... 😡😡better find somewhere else! — Alex Harrison (@A1exHarrison) December 31, 2016 
The Aylesbury branch of the Portuguese chain, which prides itself on its Peri-Peri chicken, was reportedly caught short after a lack of deliveries over the New Year’s bank holiday. @NandosUK run out of chicken & sweet potatoes & attitude of staff & manager was appalling. said it was ok for me to take a McDonald's in! — Fairy Rock Chick (@MrsJoZanna) December 30, 2016 How are Nando's in Aylesbury closed because they have no chicken HAHAHAHA 
Diners complained it had taken several dishes off the menu because of a lack of poultry. 
A Nando’s spokesman said: “It seems Aylesbury residents chose chicken over turkey this Christmas! 
“We’re sorry to any customers affected on the day, and are pleased to confirm that the restaurant was soon replenished.” More about:
